id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-ecological-bioregional-bioregional care economy integrates human and ecosystem flourishing
title: Bioregional care economy integrates human and ecosystem flourishing
description: Bioregional care economy integrates human and ecosystem flourishing
content:
Scenario: Bioregional care economy integrates human and ecosystem flourishing
    Given Jasmine participates in care economy across multiple contexts
    And all human care depends on functioning ecosystems
    When her personal_agent provides comprehensive care economy view
    Then it should integrate ecological care with social and economic care
    And show that caring for ecosystems enables caring for people
    And demonstrate that bioregional health is inseparable from community health
    And help her understand care economy as integrated human-ecological system
    And build expectation that economy must serve both human and ecosystem flourishing
    And internalize that her generation must heal relationship between economy and ecology
